title: What Were You Put Here on Earth to Do?
text: Crosswalk.com aims to offer the most compelling biblically-based content to Christians on their walk with Jesus . Crosswalk.com is your online destination for all areas of Christian Living â€“ faith, family, fun, and community. Each category is further divided into areas important to you and your Christian faith including Bible study , daily devotions , marriage , parenting , movie reviews , music, news, and more. Spiritual Growth and Christian Living Resources What Were You Put Here on Earth to Do?
